titleStmt.title: Newes from Rome, Spalato's doome. O An epitome of the life and behaviour of M. Antonius de Dominis first Bishop of Segnia, afterwards Archbishop of Spalato; who about some seven or eight yeeres since came from Venice into England: and from thence by the practise and perswasion of the L. Gundamar, departed to Rome: and of late was imprisoned in the catle of Saint Angelo. Herein contained the reasons for which he was imprisoned, together with his miserable disastrous end.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Richard Whitaker,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 7007a on UMI microfilm, reel 738.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
